body.description: Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive* infant formula is gentle nutrition designed to ease common tummy troubles like fussiness and gas due to lactose sensitivity. Our formula has an exclusive blend of 5 HMO prebiotics structurally identical to those in breast milk and nutrition designed for immune support, brain development, and digestive health. Similac is the #1 brand fed in hospitals. Ingredients in Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive have no artificial growth hormones† and are non-GMO.‡ * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. ‡ Ingredients not genetically engineered. § Offers may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: First & Only Infant Formula With 5 HMOs Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive* is gentle nutrition designed to ease fussiness and gas due to lactose sensitivity. Similac 360 Total Care is the first and only infant formula with a blend of 5 HMOs, our closest prebiotic blend to that in breast milk, and is designed to provide 360 total nutrition to support your baby’s health and development. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. Immune Support Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive is designed to help strengthen baby’s immune system. Brain Development Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive has building blocks for your baby’s developing brain. Digestive Health HMOs feed good bacteria in baby’s gut, where 70% of the immune system exists.

No Palm Olein Oil Formulas with no palm olein oil have been shown to promote softer stools for your baby, more like breastfed infants. And our no palm olein oil fat blend allows for excellent calcium absorption for strong bones. Available in a 3 Pack Save up to 15% with Subscribe & Save. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more. Feeding Resources No matter how you choose to feed your baby, Similac is here to support your journey. The Similac Feeding Expert team can provide nutrition support and feeding advice when you need it.

Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive* Similac 360 Total Care* Similac Pro-Total Comfort* Complete Nutrition for Infants ✓ ✓ ✓ Has a blend of DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓ 5-HMO Prebiotic Blend including 2'-FL HMO ✓ ✓ Has 2'-FL HMO for Immune Support ✓ For Fussiness & Gas Due to Lactose Sensitivity ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These premade ones are a life saver for us. Most of the time we do use powder and make our own pitchers everyday. But this is a nice option when things are crazy busy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for our baby long-term
reviews.reviewText: Our baby used the powder version of this for a long time and then developed GERD so she had to go on medication. She also could not tolerate the powder formula anymore and started to refuse it and had more frequent spitting up *probably from the reflux. We switched her to the pre made formula because we heard that sometimes it can make a difference. She tolerated it, and liked it, for quite some time before becoming intolerant of it and refusing it again. She is now on the similac sensitive pre made and has been doing well on that one so far. Nothing was wrong with this formula, it was just that our baby couldn't tolerate it after a while. I should also mention it is wildly expensive as most pre-made formulas are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but hard to find in stores
reviews.reviewText: Great product but hard to find in stores or online

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Best formula! My son does very well w it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So handy for busy people
reviews.reviewText: We go through a lot of formula with our twins and this makes bottles super easy. The bottles expire 48hr after opening so be sure to plan to use it up accordingly. My bottles arrived with 17 months of shelf life remaining which is great. The babies seem to like the premixed more than powdered so if they are feeling a bit under the weather this is a good boost of energy for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best formula and so easy
reviews.reviewText: We combo feed and this is great for the middle of the night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle for when we supplement just mind how long this lasts once opened
reviews.reviewText: We used the advanced pro version with my first daughter, and now for my second, we have tried the 360 total care. We supplement at times, and this has been so gentle for my daughter. No spit ups and her tummy is fine! I love the premixed bottles because they just make my life so much easier. Not that it's hard to mix formula but it's just one less step - here you just pour and warm up. My daughter only consumes about 24 oz a day so a bottle of these lasts us a day and a few feedings for the next day. Just be sure that you use this up within the required timeframe as listed on the container. If you are supplementing just a few bottles a week, then these may not work for you in this premade format. These specific containers are best for exclusive or maybe half formula fed, so that you don't waste it.
